name: Farland[Celeste classic mod]
description:
Farland is a celeste classic mod that adds new mechanics, music, and a ton of other things. there is no gemskip sadly. but if you have no experience with celeste classic then you should play it, because if you haven't played celeste classic some of these levels may be too hard, and its also just a great game

also warning the game may lag on the web, so I would personally recommend one of the downloadable versions

Credits to Matt Thorson and Noel Berry for celeste classic and to RubyRed for the new music and to the Celeste classic discord its an amazing server full of supportive people
